casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Dawayne David KNOLTON No. 425P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Jennifer T. Harrod, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Knolton, Dawayne David

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of June 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
